description.value: You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spellmaster's Ward] focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide
